UpdateRoot.testTitle: Time-Based Arrival Sequencing Optimization (arrival delay threshold validation)
UpdateRoot.testObjective:
This test verifies that SKYRADAR only adjusts arrival sequence positions when the calculated arrival delay exceeds AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD (120 seconds).
Conditions for automatic arrival sequence adjustment are:
1) The AMAN (Arrival Manager) system status is equal to OPERATIONAL.
2) The track is in ARRIVAL flight phase with valid time-to-threshold prediction.
3) The track is located within the Extended Terminal Maneuvering Area (E-TMA) boundary.
4) The calculated arrival delay is greater than CSP: AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD (120 seconds).
5) The track has an assigned arrival runway with active AMAN sequencing enabled.
6) The potential sequence position change would not violate minimum time-based separation (VSP: TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME = 90 seconds).
- 1st step: Arrival delay is 90 seconds (below threshold), sequence adjustment should NOT occur.
- 2nd step: Arrival delay increases to 150 seconds (above threshold), sequence adjustment SHOULD occur.
- 3rd step: Arrival delay reduces to 110 seconds (below threshold), sequence adjustment should NOT occur.
CSP: AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD=120 seconds. VSP: TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME=90 seconds.
All conditions except C4 are met for automatic sequence adjustment.
UpdateRoot.actionComment: Track BAW308 has varying arrival delays to test threshold-based sequence adjustment triggering (condition C4).
UpdateRoot.actionDescription: Track is configured with all conditions satisfied except arrival delay magnitude. Delay variations test whether sequence adjustment depends on exceeding AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD.

TestResult.resultDescription: Baseline: Arrival delay is 90 seconds (below 120s threshold), sequence adjustment should NOT be generated.
TestResult.nextActionComment: Track experiences increased delay at time 10000, arrival delay now 150 seconds.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: With arrival delay exceeding AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD (150s > 120s), sequence adjustment alert should be generated.

TestResult.resultDescription: Arrival delay is 150 seconds (exceeds 120s threshold), sequence adjustment SHOULD be generated.
TestResult.nextActionComment: Track speeds up at time 15000, arrival delay reduces to 110 seconds.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: With arrival delay below AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD (110s < 120s), sequence adjustment alert should NOT be generated.

TestResult.resultDescription: Arrival delay is 110 seconds (below 120s threshold), sequence adjustment should NOT be generated.
